name: Laxmi Aarti
description: Best Laxmi aarti app with the following feature:  Repeat aarti for 1, 3, 7 or 11 times.  Set the aarti as Alarm.  Set the aarti as Ringtone.  No requirement of internet during use of app.  Smooth transitions & full of animations.  Hindi & English Lyrics .  Text in sync with the audio.  Can use Bell , Shankh & Garlend (Foolon ki mala).  Beautiful collection of Laxmi Mata Images , which changes itself during use of app.  Option to select image change interval.  Continuos update on the present count/Repetition of aarti.  Notify user when run in background.  No push ads, spam in app.
